title: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEAC3A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type AC3A model. The model represents the field-controlled alternator-rectifier excitation systems designated Type AC3A. These excitation systems include an alternator main exciter with non-controlled rectifiers. The exciter employs self-excitation, and the voltage regulator power is derived from the exciter output voltage.  Therefore, this system has an additional nonlinearity, simulated by the use of a multiplier whose inputs are the voltage regulator command signal, , and the exciter output voltage, , times .  This model is applicable to excitation systems employing static voltage regulators.   Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 6.3.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcIEEEAC3A

efdn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Value of at which feedback gain changes (E).  Typical Value = 2.36. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 45.62. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (K).  Typical Value = 0.104. Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Demagnetizing factor, a function of exciter alternator reactances (K).  Typical Value = 0.499. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gains (K).  Typical Value = 0.143. Default: 0.0

kn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

kr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Constant associated with regulator and alternator field power supply (K).  Typical Value = 3.77. Default: 0.0

seve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, V, back of commutating reactance (S[V]).  Typical Value = 1.143. Default: 0.0

seve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, V, back of commutating reactance (S[V]).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.013. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 1.17. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

vamax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vamin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -0.95. Default: 0.0

ve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (V) equals V(V).  Typical Value = 6.24. Default: 0.0

ve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (V).  Typical Value = 4.68. Default: 0.0

vemin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum exciter voltage output (V).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

vfemax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limit reference (V).  Typical Value = 16. Default: 0.0
